This carefully formulated herbal drink presents an excellent way to refresh your body system and enjoy good health. 

It takes care of any form of viral, bacterial,fungal and parasitic Infections in men and women, Good for treatment of Pile Aids immune system function May be used as a detoxifier. 

Not for pregnant women,nursing mothers and children below the age of 12years. 

Multi stream also have a soap called Iru Antiseptic Herbal Soap and it's very effective.

Morning: 30ml before meal 
Night: 30ml last thing at night before bedtime. 

Take warm water 15mins after each dose.

 Children below 12yrs must not take it.
